title: Two Spirits Love
resume: The title speaks of Mario’s character who’s a businessman and has a condition, he loses his memory and becomes someone who is the complete opposite of his former self and only remembers Mint or someone who looks like Mint, and we’ll get to see how he plays two different personalities while trying to figure out his real self, and come to term with this new revelation. Thus the ‘two spirits’ love.’
